remarks: Lemma for ~ axc11n .  Similar to ~ cbv3h .  Requires distinct variables but avoids ~ ax-13 .  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jul-2015.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 29-Dec-2017.)
statement:
cbv3hv.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. y ph ) $.
cbv3hv.2 $e |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) $.
cbv3hv.3 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
cbv3hv $p |- ( A. x ph -> A. y ps ) $.
$d x y $.
